newsitem.title: USA: American Pad sees Q1 shr $0.15 to $0.16.
newsitem.headline: American Pad sees Q1 shr $0.15 to $0.16.

text.p: American Pad & Paper Co said Tuesday that its preliminary net income in the quarter would be about $4.3 million to $4.8 million, or $0.15 to $0.16 per share, on net sales of about $149 million.
Wall Street had been expecting the company to report earnings of $0.17 per share for the first quarter, according to First Call consensus estimates.

The company said consolidation in the office superstore market affected product and supply sales throughout the industry, but said "the fundamental core business is sound." It also said a slight softening of paper prices affected customer inventories, but that this should improve as prices stabilize.
"With the assumption of a reasonably stable business environment going forward, we remain confident in our ability to achieve earnings growth goals for the year," the company said in a release.
The company said it will report actual results for the first quarter on April 21.
